greeting: <es name='Yawn_02' />  Oh! Hello, <participant-name>! So nice to see you again. <es name='affection_05' /> Looking at you reminds me it's dance time! <es name='Groovy_music_dance_01' /> That was fun. <break size='1.0' />  <es name='Body_Look_Center_Down_01'> Oh, look! <break size='1.0'/> It's your robot </es>, and that's my friend Zoey, the squirrel!<es name='Emoji_Sun' />

all: hmm, it looks like someone hid all the nuts in a secret place, and we need to find them. <es cat='sad' />
c-g-: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different nuts here?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.
c-g+: <es cat='question'> Will you help me find different nuts here?</es> <break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.
c+g-: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how many nuts there are in the playground?</es><break size='0.5'/> <es cat='question'/> Will you help me find different <prize-name>s here?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.
c+g+: <es cat='curious'>I wonder how many nuts there are in the playground?</es><break size='0.5'/> <es cat='question'/> Will you help me find different <prize-name>s here?<break size='1.0' /> <es name='SpinHead_01' /> Let's discover together what there is in the playground.

all: We found so many <prize-name>s! <es name = 'affection_01'/> Great job partner! <es name='SpinHead_01' />
<es name='Yawn_01' /> Okay, after working hard, I really can use a nap. <break size='1.0' /> Until next time, bye!

question0: <es cat='question'/>I wonder how long Zoey's tail is.
question1: <es cat='curious'/>I wonder how long the winter is.
question2: <es cat='question'/>It would be so interesting to know how tall the world's tallest tree is.
question3: <es cat='curious'/>I wonder what kind of tree these nuts grow on. <break size='0.5'/>maple? <break size='0.5'/>or chestnut?
question4: <es cat='question'/>I wonder how many nuts Zoey can put in her mouth.
question5: <es cat='curious'/>I am curious how fast Zoey can peel these nuts.

ask_question_party: <es cat='question'>I wonder where Zoey will keep all these nuts.</es>
